extendedInfo.description: 40 additional levels and no ads vs. Shift Lite!  Update 1.4 of Shift includes multitouch, overall improved game controls and ability to download to your SD card.Shift is an adventure puzzle platformer with a literal twist to the game play mechanic. You are subject 32763, trapped in an experiment. Can you find your way out? Antony Lavelle at Armor Games originally designed Shift for the desktop web. Since then it's been played by more than 10-million people. Due to popular demand, It was then released on the other touch screen devices, and over 1 million users have downloaded the game. Now, Shift is finally available for Android!Shift is based on the negative-space centric platform concept in a style elegant, yet minimalistic, and pulsating with spy music. Use the [arrows] to navigate your man of mystery along the levels and to jump. After a couple of warm-up levels, you'll need to master the art of Shift. Shifting flips you beneath the floor on which you are standing, and reverses both your body color and gravity. It's up to you to spot the paths that are available using this mechanism, and to figure out how to make it to the exit for each level. Hindering â or occasionally helping â your progress are impassable platforms, which can be rotated out of the way by collecting the proper key.Features:1.	All the original levels of the classic desktop web game, plus2.	More than 40 new levels, only available on the full version of Shift3.	Unique control mechanics4.	Users can SHARE scores via Twitter5.	Available in English, Spanish, FrenchFollow @Handmark on Twitter for updates or visit www.handmark.com/games/shiftApplication developed in partnership with Fishing Cactus.REVIEWS:"Shift for Android is the new Angry Birds....plenty fun and seriously addictive." - Recombu.com"â¦just the sort of brain tickler we like." -PocketGamer.co.uk"â¦this game is shaping up to become my next Android gaming addiction." -Android and Me"Itâs a great game that will get you eye-boggled. And damn, do we love it." -Droidism.net"Cool new app" âAndroid Communityâ...one of the most interesting puzzle games I've ever come across..." âPhandroid.comâIt becomes rather difficult and addictive very fast.â-AndroidSpin.com

reviews.title: Worth your time
reviews.comment: Cool concept, great fun, but too short and too easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The new controls make this game an easy 5 star. Smooth animation, great concept, and addicting. Great work, devs! Thanks for listening. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be a 5 star ap. if it wasnt for the bad location of the mute/pause icon...otherwise totally innovative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Move 2sd where?
reviews.comment: Amazing game,i\'ve lowered my rating to 3 stars as u state moves to sd but it doesn\'t ,more levels please, when is shift 2 coming to Android?ios has it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game is a bit short, and it constantly generates silent errors in the background (saw them with logcat).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game, works great on Sony Ericsson x8, but game needs to be updated a bit more because it doesnt last very long and gets boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awful/non-responsive controls, cant get jump to function at all, making game impossible to play. Enable keypad mapping or i want my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game flaws
reviews.comment: Great game if the touch screen controls work never have a problem with any other game but if it works on ur phone worth the money and fun

reviews.comment: Very very fun game. But I beat it in under 30 minutes several months ago and still no new levels!! Needs an update dev!

reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars if there were more levels...but awesome game very addicting

reviews.comment: Good game but why lie? Only the free version saves to SD card, now removing but no refund allowed !!! HTC desire

reviews.comment: Can\'t. stop. Playing. -William Shatner. Addictive fun, proof less is more. More levels please!

reviews.comment: Would be even better if it had more levels, but still a really great game

reviews.title: Shift 2
reviews.comment: I\'ve enjoyed this game very much, but I don\'t understand why the Shift!2 version is available on the Apple App Store for free and on here we have to pay for Shift 1. I will rate Shift!2 with 5stars when I\'m able to download it on GooglePlay.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Clever. Could apply a bit more game mechanics to solicit reply beyond time. 1quibble is a lack of HW button ms overrides to lessen accidental backs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had this app on Iphone. ..been waiting long time for Android version. It did not disappoint! Awesome game people !!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this game. Played it dozens of times. However I can\'t find any of the sequels in the market. Are they even available? Samsung Tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on 4.x
reviews.comment: If fixed ... Lots of fun, perhaps a little short though. I found some levels frustrating because of the controls, but have no hesitation recommending it.

reviews.title: Good but short
reviews.comment: This is a good game with an original concept but it is very short you can complete it in less than 30 mins, it could do with some more maps and several difficulty levels all in all great fun please make some more levels

reviews.comment: It\'s fun. It\'s clever. And it\'s quite short.
